short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instantly generate customized tweets from selected text using Groq API

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Select to Tweet is a powerful Chrome extension designed for social media experts, influencers, and content creators. With simple text selection and context menu actions, you can instantly generate compelling tweets, helping you manage and publish high-quality social media content with ease.
